anchor.description: Central person, object, or theme of the experience.

spark.description: What triggered or initiated the emotional response.

wound.description: Emotional pain, loss, or vulnerability present in the experience.

fuel.description: What energized or motivated the experience.

bridge.description: Connection or shift between past and present understanding.

echo.description: What continues to resonate or recur from the experience.

narrative.description: A compressed, faithful account of the experience as described by the source, preserving emotional sequence, temporal markers, and stated context without interpretation.
